name: For Fox Sake (itch) (PetrichorGames)
description:
You are an unlucky fox on search for a cure to a curse some angry witch got on you!

Controls Keyboard:

  • Move with Arrow Keys
  • Jump with space
  • Special ability with Crtl
  • Morph with Q

Credits:

Katharina Broswik  -  2D Art, Programming, UI

Hannes Hornig  -  Programming, Level Design
